name: Wingman (Gerard Coquard)
description:
You have a mission to accomplish. You are like Tom Cruise in Top Gun. You will have to go through sea, desert, and sky, killing all enemyes through, or not. There are a lot of enemies in this game, but don't worry, you have checkpoints if you die. This game has been made by Pablo Cabrera, Jose Antonio Canovas, and Gerard Coquard. If you could give us some feedback and ideas, that would be great. Hope you enjoy the game!!!

(you can recharge your ammo with R, forgot to put it on the game controls)
